requirements.description: Your use of our Services can only be implemented if you provide notice to your users of the data collection and disclosure practices involved and obtain their consent.
Using our Services is only permissible if you provide appropriate notices to users of your application(s) about data collection and use practices related to your use of our Services.
Our Services can only be used if you obtain user consent to the data collection and use practices, including for rewarding user engagement and behaviorally targeted online advertising.
